		Our Pick, Refrigerators, Side by Side Refrigerator (SBS)
    LG 687 L Instaview Door-in-Door Side-by-Side Refrigerator (Noble Steel, Inverter Compressor, GC-Q247CSBV)
    		
    
					
    
				
    
		
    

    
			
			
			

    
	
				Add to Wishlist
	

    
			
			
			
    Compare
    
	
      

    • Frost-free side-by-side refrigerator; 687 litres
      • 

    • Warranty: 1 year on product, 10 years on compressor
      • 

    • Inverter linear compressor
      • 

    • Instaview door-in-door
      • 

    • Multi air flow
      • 

    • Smart thinQ
      • 

    

    For More Product Details:Click here
    

    

    ₹125,500.00 ₹168,990.00
    

	
	
    
		
			
    
				
		
						
    
	
		

			
    

	
	
    

			
    
		
	
    
		
      
							
    • 
					
						Description					
				
      • 
							
    • 
					
						Specification					
				
      • 
							
    • 
					
						Reviews					
				
      • 
					
    
					
    
				
    


    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    


    


    

    

    
    		


    

    

    
    		


    

    

    
    		

    

    


    

    Inverter Linear Compressor
    

    LG Refrigerators with Inverter Linear Compressor saves 51%** energy. It reduces noise by 25%***.
    

    **Based on third party test report under standard test conditions(ISO 15502).
    

    ***Based on third party test report conducted exclusively for noise of refrigerator.
    

    ~As per the test report from 3rd Party Lab, VDE issued on 13th Nov 2014.
    

    
    		


    

    Door-in-Door
    

    LG’s Unique Door-in-Door provides easy access to your favorite food items, thus reducing the cold air loss by 41%*.
    

    *Tested by Intertek.
    

    
    		


    

    Instaview Door-in-Door
    

    InstaView Door-in-Door has a sleek mirrored glass panel that illuminates with two quick knocks and allows you to see inside the easy access compartment without opening the door that keeps food fresher longer.
    

    
    		

    
    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    


    


    

    

    
    		


    

    

    
    		


    

    

    
    		

    

    


    

    Hygiene Fresh+
    

    The 5-Step anti-bacterial deodorization removes bacteria up to 99.9%* and also minimizes bad odor in the refrigerator.
    

    *As tested by Intertek.
    

    
    		


    

    SmartThinQ
    

    With LG Smart ThinQ control all your home appliances from anywhere.
    

    
    		


    

    Multi Air Flow Cooling
    

    Multiple cooling air vents distribute and circulate cool air to every corner of the refrigerator, ensuring proper cooling.
    

    
    		

    
    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    


    


    

    

    
    		


    

    

    
    		


    
    		

    

    


    

    Moist Balance Crisper
    

    Moist Balance Crisper incorporates an innovative lattice-pattern box cover which maintains optimal level of moisture inside the refrigerator.
    

    
    		


    

    Multi Digital Sensors
    

    The digital sensors monitor and respond to warm food and open doors, instantly maintaining optimum interior temperature.
